message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500.  I believe it will be very valuable to you and this is a fair price.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of something more in the range of $8,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $8,500 is too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
Hi Alice, I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you at $8,800, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider my offer?
